name: Love Story Stickers for WhatsApp - WAStickerApps
description: Express your love with the new collection of romantic love stickers and emojis for WhatsApp (wastickerapps). Hundreds of new stickers and emojis to share with your lover and make your conversations more warm and cozy. With our stickers and emojis youll be able to express your feelings better and have a lovely conversation with your lover. You can free download whatsapp stickers!  With our large collection of romantic stickers and emojis, youll never run out of things to say to your lover, whatever might be the situation. Send big hearts, love stories, cute couples, flowers, stickers for saying sorry, I love you stickers, I miss you stickers, love quotes, good morning and good night. You can even find cute fluffy animals that everyone adores.  Top Features: - Large number of Romantic Love Stickers & Emojis. - Very easy to use, one tap to install stickers to WhatsApp. - Send stickers to anyone through WhatsApp. - New Sticker packs added regularly.  By the way Love Story Stickers also known as: - Love sticker - Love whatsapp - I love stickers - Love stickers for whatsapp  How to use Love Stickers on WhatsApp: 1) Open the app on your phone, select a sticker pack and tap Download.  2) In WhatsApp, press the emoji icon, then the sticker icon at the bottom. Select your newly added sticker pack and start sharing with your lover.
